body:
This is not really femdom. It is borderline rape though. Not reverse rape. There is no such thing as reverse rape, as that would imply consent... Or just sex.

The sexually assertive/active partner just happens to be the female in this. After the fact, she is willing to take care of, and is loving to her partner.

Femdom is when the male is submissive, and usually humiliated in some form, or is being used in a sexually derogatory form. Similar to how a dominatrix treats her partners.
